column4: When I try "sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf" I get this error message "(gedit:6131): Gtk-WARNING **: cannot open displa:"
well, it means you can not open the disply for windows.
I pressed Ctrl+Alt+F1 in XWindows and got to a prompt
gedit, and all other gui applications will never work in alt-ctrl-f1. use a text editor there, like vi or nano.
